## AuthContainer.changePassword() method

Changes user password.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
changePassword(newPassword: string, oldPassword: string): Promise<User>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newPassword | <code>string</code> | New password |
|  oldPassword | <code>string</code> | Old password |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<User>`
